lines.text: The doors made me do it!
Do you believe in love at first sight?
It saves a lot of time.
You're a nice guy. But you've got to remember that nice guys always leave when ladies ask them to.
That nice, I ain't.
When I'm relaxed my thoughts are clear.
Yeah, I can even read them from here.
Early to rise and early to bed, makes a man healthy, but socially dead!
Sure, I want to sleep. Everyone sleeps once in a while, remember? You'd think I wanted to do something peculiar.
What's your name?
What's the difference? Sit down and have a drink. It's drinking that makes you beautiful.
Aw, I haven't been drinking.
I know, but I have.
Oh, this leaves me speechless.
Good. Stay that way.
Some day you road skinners will be sayin', "Joe Fabrini's a good guy to work for." And I will be.
Anything else?
Yeah, but it ain't on the menu.
And it ain't gunna be.
I'll pay you back.
Yeah, I'm real worried about that. I've got it all doped out with the cops if you don't
If we go over a cliff, wake me up.

[Spraying himself with a hose]
This is the nearest thing I've had to a bath in two weeks.
Yeah, I noticed.
Well, you don't have to be nasty about it.
We don't have to be, but it's more fun that way.
You know, when I was riding that truck, I used to think I'd never get enough of staying home. I've got enough all right.
Ed's been always all right with me, and I'm never gonna be wrong with him.
It's a classy chassis!
You couldn't even afford the headlights.
You know something, Red? l like you. l like the way you fill out your clothes. l like everything about you.
l ain't danced in a long time.
Me neither, and l used to love it. lt's the most fun you can have without laughing.
Give me a cup of coffee.
Anything else?
Yeah, what else you got that ain't poisonous?
I don't know. I never eat here.
